Class GradeDAO

java.lang.Object
dao.GradeDAO
public class GradeDAO extends Object
Data Access Object for Grade entities. Provides CRUD operations for the Grade table in the database.

    • addGrade

      public int addGrade(Grade grade) throws SQLException
      Creates a new grade in the database.
      Parameters:
      grade - The grade object to be added to the database
      Returns:
      The generated grade ID if successful
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs

    • getGradeById

      public Optional<Grade> getGradeById(int gradeId)
      Retrieves a grade by its ID.
      Parameters:
      gradeId - The ID of the grade to retrieve
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the grade if found, or empty if not found

    • getAllGrades

      public List<Grade> getAllGrades()
      Retrieves all grades from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all grades

    • getGradesByStudent

      public List<Grade> getGradesByStudent(int studentId)
      Retrieves grades for a specific student.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student
      Returns:
      A list of grades for the specified student

    • getGradesByTeacher

      public List<Grade> getGradesByTeacher(int teacherId)
      Retrieves grades given by a specific teacher.
      Parameters:
      teacherId - The ID of the teacher
      Returns:
      A list of grades given by the specified teacher

    • getGradesBySubject

      public List<Grade> getGradesBySubject(String subject)
      Retrieves grades for a specific subject.
      Parameters:
      subject - The subject
      Returns:
      A list of grades for the specified subject

    • updateGrade

      public boolean updateGrade(int gradeId, char mark, String comment) throws SQLException
      Updates a grade's mark and comment
      Parameters:
      gradeId - The ID of the grade to update
      mark - The new mark for the grade
      comment - The new comment for the grade
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database error occurs

    • deleteGrade

      public boolean deleteGrade(int gradeId)
      Deletes a grade from the database.
      Parameters:
      gradeId - The ID of the grade to delete
      Returns:
      true if the deletion was successful, false otherwise

    • isValidMark

      public boolean isValidMark(char mark)
      Validates a grade mark.
      Parameters:
      mark - The mark to validate
      Returns:
      true if the mark is valid (A-F), false otherwise

    • getAverageGradeForStudent

      public double getAverageGradeForStudent(int studentId)
      Gets the average grade for a student.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student
      Returns:
      The average grade value (1-5 where A=5, F=1) or 0 if no grades exist
